resources.string:
Welcome to Memory Game!


Objective:

Exercise your memory retention skills by replicating sequences of button presses.


How to Play:

1. Click the "Start Round" button to begin the round.
2. When the round starts, a random sequence of button presses will be displayed and played out.
3. Your task is to replicate the sequence by pressing the buttons in the same order.
4. As you progress through the game, the sequence will become longer, making the game more challenging.

Scoring:

Your score is based on your accuracy rate, which is the percentage of correctly replicated sequences compared to the total sequences played.

High scores are determined as follows:

If your accuracy rate is between 60% and 69%, your high score is 1.

If your accuracy rate is between 70% and 79%, your high score is 2.

If your accuracy rate is between 80% and 99%, your high score is 3.

If your accuracy rate is 100%, your high score is 5.

Otherwise, your high score is 0.


Statistics:
Your average round time is recorded as you play through the game, providing insight into your performance.

Get ready to challenge your memory and aim for the high score!
